trans-unit.source: Represents the XPath transform for a digital signature as defined by the W3C.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta la trasformazione di XPath per una firma digitale, come definito per la W3C.

trans-unit.source: The XmlDsigXPathTransform class allows you to address an XML document using the XPath language.
trans-unit.target: La classe XmlDsigXPathTransform consente di inviare un documento XML utilizzando il linguaggio XPath.

trans-unit.source: This class uses an XPath expression to select the XML nodes you want to sign or encrypt while removing all others from either cryptographic operation.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe viene utilizzata un'espressione XPath per selezionare i nodi XML che si desidera firmare o crittografare durante la rimozione di tutti gli altri dalle operazioni di crittografia.

trans-unit.source: Use the XmlDsigXPathTransform class to sign or encrypt specific parts of an XML document using an XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare la classe XmlDsigXPathTransform per firmare o crittografare parti specifiche di un documento XML utilizzando un'espressione XPath.

trans-unit.source: For information on initializing the XmlDsigXPathTransform class to the value of an XPath transform string, see the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni sull'inizializzazione della classe XmlDsigXPathTransform al valore di una stringa di trasformazione XPath, vedere il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the XmlDsigXPathTransform class is defined by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigXPathTransformUrl> field.
trans-unit.target: La risorsa identificatore URI (Uniform) che descrive la classe XmlDsigXPathTransform Ã¨ definito per il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigXPathTransformUrl>campo.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigXPathTransformUrl>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the XPath transform, see Section 6.6.3 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla trasformazione XPath, vedere la sezione 6.6.3 della specifica XMLDSIG, disponibile tramite il W3C in www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Returns an XML representation of the parameters of a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object that are suitable to be included as subelements of an XMLDSIG <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una rappresentazione XML dei parametri di un <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"> </xref> oggetti che possono essere inclusi come sottoelementi di un XMLDSIG <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: A list of the XML nodes that represent the transform-specific content needed to describe the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object in an XMLDSIG <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Un elenco dei nodi XML che rappresentano il contenuto specifico della trasformazione necessario per descrivere corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"> </xref> oggetto in un XMLDSIG <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Returns the output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'output dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The type of the returned object must be <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo dell'oggetto restituito deve essere <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>

trans-unit.source: Use the GetOutput method to retrieve a <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> object that contains an XML representation of an XPath transform.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo GetOutput per recuperare un <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>oggetto che contiene una rappresentazione XML di una trasformazione XPath.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>

trans-unit.source: The output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: L'output dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Returns the output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object of type <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'output dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"> </xref> oggetto di tipo <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The type of the returned object must be <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo dell'oggetto restituito deve essere <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>

trans-unit.source: Use the GetOutput method to retrieve a <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> object that contains an XML representation of an XPath transform.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo GetOutput per recuperare un <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>oggetto che contiene una rappresentazione XML di una trasformazione XPath.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>

trans-unit.source: The type of the output to return.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di output da restituire.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref> is the only valid type for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref>Ã¨ l'unico tipo valido per questo parametro.

trans-unit.source: The output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object of type <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'output dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"> </xref> oggetto di tipo <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The type parameter is not an object.
trans-unit.target: Il type parametro non Ã¨ un oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of types that are valid inputs to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput*> method of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una matrice di tipi di input valido per il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput*>metodo dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput*>

trans-unit.source: The valid input types to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> are <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, and <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.
trans-unit.target: Tipi di input validi per <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>sono <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>e <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>

trans-unit.source: An array of valid input types for the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object; you can pass only objects of one of these types to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput*> method of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Una matrice di tipi di input validi per l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"> </xref> oggetto; Ã¨ possibile passare solo oggetti di uno di questi tipi per il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput*>metodo dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInput*>

trans-unit.source: Parses the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref> object as transform-specific content of a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element and configures the internal state of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object to match the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Consente di analizzare specificato <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"> </xref> oggetto come contenuto specifico della trasformazione di un <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""> </xref> elemento e configura lo stato interno dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"> </xref> oggetto in modo che corrisponda il <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Use the LoadInnerXml method to initialize the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class with an XPath transform.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo LoadInnerXml per inizializzare la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>classe con una trasformazione XPath.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>

trans-unit.source: To initialize the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class with an XPath transform, complete the following steps.
trans-unit.target: Per inizializzare la <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>classe con una trasformazione XPath, completare i passaggi seguenti.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>

trans-unit.source: Create a new <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> class and set the <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerText%2A> property to the value of an XPath transform string.
trans-unit.target: Creare un nuovo <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>e impostare il <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerText%2A>il valore di una stringa di trasformazione XPath della proprietÃ .</xref:System.Xml.XmlElement.InnerText%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A> method to create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> object that represents the transform.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare il <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A>metodo per creare un <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>oggetto che rappresenta la trasformazione.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNode.SelectNodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: Create a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class and pass the previously created <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> object to the LoadInnerXml method.
trans-unit.target: Creare una nuova istanza di <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>classe e passare l'oggetto creato in precedenza <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>oggetto al metodo LoadInnerXml.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref> object to load into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"> </xref> oggetto da caricare in corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: The nodeList parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The nodeList parameter is .

trans-unit.source: -or- The nodeList parameter does not contain an element.
trans-unit.target: - o - nodeList parametro non contiene un elemento.

trans-unit.source: Loads the specified input into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Carica l'input specificato in corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Use the LoadInput method to initialize an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> object to the value of an XPath transform using an <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, or <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> object.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il metodo LoadInput per inizializzare un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>oggetto con il valore di una trasformazione XPath utilizzando un <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, o <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>oggetto.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>

trans-unit.source: For information about initializing an <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> object using an XPath transform string, see the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni sull'inizializzazione di un <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>utilizzando una stringa di trasformazione XPath, vedere il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.LoadInnerXml%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>

trans-unit.source: The type of the input object must be one of the types in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.InputTypes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo dell'oggetto di input deve essere uno dei tipi di <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.InputTypes%2A>proprietÃ .</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.InputTypes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The input to load into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Input da caricare in corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"> </xref> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of types that are possible outputs from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput*> methods of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una matrice di tipi che sono possibili output il <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput*>metodi dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"> </xref> oggetto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput*>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> is the only valid output type for <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>Ã¨ il tipo di output valido solo per <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform></xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>

trans-unit.source: An array of valid output types for the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object; the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput*> methods of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"></xref> object return only objects of one of these types.
trans-unit.target: Una matrice di tipi di output valido per l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"> </xref> ; oggetto i <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput*>metodi dell'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform"> </xref> restituiscono solo oggetti di uno di questi tipi di oggetto.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform.GetOutput*>
